user_query: I want to impress my colleagues with some interesting trivia at the next team meeting. Find me a random trivia fact from Numbers API and fetch the details of a specific player with the ID '5678' from Free NBA to discuss their career achievements.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random trivia fact from Numbers API to share at the meeting.
Fetch details of the player with ID '5678' from Free NBA to discuss their career achievements.
